Entries.default: "Guess this means we can get back to focusing on the Pr√≠ncipi."
"Half the Bardatto guards are on the take. Making money hand over fist over there..."
"If you've got business, Atello's usually in his study."
"Martino's been more... prickly than usual. Hey, don't tell him I said so!"
"The death of Orso weighs heavily on this house."
"A cousin of mine is a Bardatto guard. Doing well for himself."
"Neketaka is too small for the Valeras and the Bardattos."
"None is more respected than House Valera."
"Dignity and courage will win out every time."
